title: HoP 360 - Dag N. Hasse on Arabic Learning in the Renaissance
itunes:title: HoP 360 - Dag N. Hasse on Arabic Learning in the Renaissance
description: An interview with Dag Nikolaus Hasse on the Renaissance reception of Averroes, Avicenna, and other authors who wrote in Arabic.
content:encoded: An interview with Dag Nikolaus Hasse on the Renaissance reception of Averroes, Avicenna, and other authors who wrote in Arabic.
